title: in a residential zone, beyond the compulsory side and rear open spaces stipulated in Sr
clause_text: in a residential zone, beyond the compulsory side and rear open spaces stipulated in Sr. No g of Regulation 28 of, if other conditions under sub-rule (b) above are satisfied. Here the parking space may be an unenclosed covered space.
